Name: Conundrum
About the game: Conundrum is a puzzle game in which you play as a cat solving various puzzles in a bright and colorful dimension. This is not another game with flying objects in the air, there is a real physics that you have to fight with. The cat's goal is to get into his basket! You will need to comprehend the game mechanics with just one mouse button and use them for light purposes. Help the kitten get to his basket using the surrounding objects! During the game, you will receive in-game coins that you can spend on various items. Nice visuals and unique levels will not let you get bored even after the second playthrough of the game!
